title: Jerboa
description: This is a Jerboa's 3D model and animations.
longDescription:
-Characters folder contains Skeletal Meshes of Jerboa.

-Low poly and middle poly models are included in this folder.

-Animations folder contains animations of Jerboa.

-The Animations/InPlace folder and the Animations/RootMotion folder contain In-place and Root Motion animation variations, respectively.

-Textures contains the texture of the body of Jerboa and the texture of the whisker of Jerboa.

-These are the main contents of this asset.

-BP_AIJerboa's AI has minimum functions.

-BP_AIJerboa supports Navi mesh.

-You can use it just drag and drop it onto the scene.

-This character's AI's function is only to simply follow the player.

-You can easily modify or replace this with your own AI.

-For that reason AnimBP_Jerboa has the following features.

-The animation is synchronized with angular velocity and forward velocity of capsule component.

And automatically change the animation rate according to MaxWalkSpeed.

Also, depending on the change in the scale of the character, the animation rate is changed.

Thanks to these features, even if you modify the character's BP, it animates without slipping the feet.


BP_JerboaThirdPersonCharacter operation method:

wasd or arrow: walk

r+(wasd or arrow): run

j:jump

8:speed up

2:slow down

tab:Attack, H:Hit

m:Sit down

k:Death, L:Rebirth

g:Grooming

t:Toggle the tail physics

p:Toggle the mesh collision response to physics body
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • A demonstration is ready with an operable character(BP_JerboaThirdPersonCharacter).
  • In the demonstration you can use AI character that follows the player(BP_AIJerboa).
  • The feet of these characters are grounded at the correct position and angle with respect to the ground by using two bone IK and animation curves.

Scaled to Epic skeleton: No

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of characters:1

Vertex counts of characters:

Mesh_JerboaMiddlePoly:4806

Mesh_JerboaLowPoly:1205

Texture Resolutions:

Tex_JerboaBodyB.png(Base color):1024x1024

Tex_JerboaBodyN.png(Normal):1024x1024

TexJerboaBodyR.png(Roughness):512x512

Tex_JerboaWhiskerB(Base color):512x512

Tex_JerboaWhiskerN(Normal):512x512

Tex_JErboaWhiskerM(Opacity mask):512x512

Number of Animations:49

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place):Both

Animation types:both(49Animations+38root motion variation of walk and run)

Supported Development Platforms:Windows, OS X

Supported Target Build Platforms:Windows, OS X, Android, iOS

Documentation:http://eizouasobi.blogspot.jp/search/label/Unreal%20Jerboa

Important/Additional Notes:The number of bones is 72.
